title: ↪ 📱 Elegant, Double Master, Ocean Front NORTH BEACH: Great Unit  2/2 Bel-Ai
posting_body: ['REF# 11R119', '$7200 · 1126 Sqft · Bel-Aire On The Ocean Con · 2/2 · North Beach · Unfurnished', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', 'Elegant, double master, ocean front condo with the best and rarely available 03 line.', 'This gorgeously captivating unit has floor to ceiling glass windows with unobstructed ocean views from every room.', 'Split master floor plans with separate terraces overlooking the Atlantic Ocean.', 'This home has been updated exquisitely with high end finishes and brand-new sophisticated, Italian furnishings, perfect for the affluent, ready to move in!', 'The Bel-Aire on the Ocean is a desirable luxury boutique building with 24-hour concierge services.', 'Privileged located on Millionaires Row, directly on the beach with exceptional beach services, a private pool, gym and business center.', "This enticing property won't last long!Read", 'Less', 'REF# 11R119', 'tags:', '23 biscayne bay, opera tower, vizcayne, fortune house, the ivy, vizcayne, st. louis condo, imperial at brickell, isola, the grand condo, parc lofts, resorts world miami, brickell ten condo, bayshore place condo, icon brickell one, the ivy, viceroy, ten museum park, the vue at brickell condo, carbonell condo, the edge on brickell, el portal homes, harbour hill club, imperial at brickell, axis on brickell north, bay view, one miami, axis on brickell, the loft ii, panorama tower, marquis, uptown lofts,, courvoisier courts condo, marina blue', '_mr11']
